message: I propose a 90/10 split. Let's start with a fair and generous offer.
You started with a generous offer, but I think I can do better than that. Let's see if you can do the same!
I'm willing to compromise, but a 60/40 split seems more fair to me. What do you think?
I'm not convinced that 60/40 is fair, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. Let's see if you can do better than that!
